item.title: 墨西哥设定新鲜番茄最低出口价格
item.description: 墨西哥经济部和农业部周日在一份联合声明中说，在与美国达成的双边协议到期后，墨西哥为新鲜番茄设定了最低出口价格，以保护其国内生产并确保国内供应。【原文：Mexico has set minimum export prices for fresh tomatoes to protect its domestic production and ensure internal supply after a bilateral agreement with the U.S. expired, Mexico's economy and agriculture ministries said in a joint statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 加航空姐组织全国行动抗议工作条件
item.description: 加拿大公共雇员工会（Canadian Union of Public Employees）在周日的一份声明中说，加航空乘人员将于周一在加拿大主要机场同时举行行动，抗议工作条件，并要求承认关键的谈判问题。【原文：Air Canada flight attendants will hold simultaneous actions at major Canadian airports on Monday to protest working conditions and demand recognition of key bargaining issues, the Canadian Union of Public Employees said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 投资者比尔-阿克曼提议合并房利美和房地美
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）在周日的 X 帖子中建议合并美国政府资助的企业房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac），认为此举将有助于降低抵押贷款利率，并在运营和交易价格方面实现巨大的协同效应。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman in an X post on Sunday suggested merging U.S. government-sponsored enterprises Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, suggesting the move would help reduce mortgage rates and achieve huge synergies both in their operations and in the trading price.】

item.title: 特朗普的 401(k) 令为退休投资组合增加了新的风险层
item.description: 虽然对私募股权、加密货币或私人控股公司的投资可以提供更高的回报，但批评者认为，与传统退休计划相比，这些投资缺乏同样的信息披露，费用也更高。【原文：While investments in private equity, crypto or privately held companies could offer higher returns, critics say they lack the same disclosures and carry higher fees than traditional retirement plans.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体称英伟达 H20 芯片对中国不安全
item.description: 隶属于中国国家媒体的一个社交媒体账户周日称，英伟达（Nvidia）的 H20 芯片给中国带来了安全隐患，此前中国政府对这些芯片的后门访问提出了担忧。【原文：Nvidia's H20 chips pose security concerns for China, a social media account affiliated with China's state media said on Sunday, after Beijing raised concerns over backdoor access in those chips.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国希望美国放宽芯片出口管制，作为贸易协议的一部分
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平可能举行峰会之前，中国希望美国放宽对人工智能芯片关键部件的出口管制，以此作为贸易协议的一部分。【原文：China wants the United States to ease export controls on a critical component for artificial intelligence chips as part of a trade deal ahead of a possible summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 智利科德尔科公司获劳工检查员批准重启埃尔特尼恩特运营项目
item.description: 铜矿商 Codelco 周六表示，已获得智利劳动监察局的授权，开始恢复其旗舰企业 El Teniente 铜矿的某些作业。【原文：Copper miner Codelco received authorization from Chile's labor inspector office to begin resuming certain operations at its flagship El Teniente copper mine, it said on Saturday, after more than a week of suspended operations following a deadly collapse that killed six workers.】

item.title: 白宫加密货币顾问博-海因斯宣布离职
item.description: 曾担任共和党总统唐纳德-特朗普的数字资产顾问委员会主席的博-海因斯周六表示，他将离开目前的职位，重返私营部门。【原文：Bo Hines, who headed Republican President Donald Trump's Council of Advisers on Digital Assets, said on Saturday he was leaving his current role and returning to the private sector.】

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会鲍曼：最新就业数据强化了对 2025 年三次降息的支持
item.description: 美联储负责监管的副主席米歇尔-鲍曼周六表示，近期疲软的就业数据凸显了她对劳动力市场脆弱性的担忧，并增强了她对自己的预测的信心，即今年可能会有三次降息。【原文：The Federal Reserve's vice chair of supervision, Michelle Bowman, on Saturday said recent weak job data underscores her concerns about labor market fragility and strengthens her confidence in her own forecast that three interest-rate cuts will likely be appropriate this year.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特朗普支持的世界自由基金会提议设立 15 亿美元的加密货币持有人
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普家族支持的加密风险投资公司世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）正在向投资者征集15亿美元的资金，旨在成立一家上市公司，持有其WLFI代币。【原文：World Liberty Financial, a crypto venture backed by U.S. President Donald Trump's family, is sounding out investors for a $1.5 billion fundraising meant to set up a public company that will hold its WLFI tokens, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 中国 7 月居民消费价格持平，出厂价格低于预期
item.description: 中国 7 月份居民消费价格持平，而生产者价格降幅超出预期，凸显了国内需求疲软和贸易不确定性持续存在对消费者和企业情绪的影响。【原文：China's consumer prices were unchanged in July, while producer prices fell more than expected, underscoring the impact of sluggish domestic demand and persistent trade uncertainty on consumer and business sentiment.】

item.title: 中国 7 月居民消费价格持平
item.description: 由于国内需求疲软和贸易不确定性打击了消费者和企业的士气，7 月份中国居民消费价格持平，而生产者通货紧缩持续。【原文：China's consumer prices were unchanged in July while producer deflation persisted, as consumer and business morale took a hit from weak domestic demand and trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普的环保机构终止与工会员工的合同
item.description: 据工会主席称，美国环境保护局已着手终止与工会员工的合同，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统推动削弱联邦政府集体谈判的最新行动。【原文：The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency moved to end its contract with unionized employees, according to the union's president, the latest action in President Donald Trump’s push to weaken collective bargaining across the federal government.】

item.title: 美国提议与 Greystar 达成和解，以终止涉嫌的租金价格串通行为
item.description: 美国司法部周五表示，已提交一份拟议和解协议，以解决针对公寓管理公司 Greystar 的索赔案，该案指控其在租房市场中存在算法串通和反竞争行为。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Friday that it had filed a proposed settlement to resolve claims against apartment manager Greystar in a case alleging algorithmic collusion and anticompetitive practices in rental markets.】

item.title: 美国提议将纽瓦克机场航班削减期限延长至 2026 年 10 月
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周五表示，由于纽瓦克机场继续面临空中交通管制员短缺和交通拥堵问题，该局建议将纽瓦克机场的航班削减期延长至 2026 年 10 月。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Friday it is proposing to extend flight cuts at Newark, one of the three main airports serving the New York City-area, through October 2026 as it continues to face air traffic controller shortage and congestion issues.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英伟达首席执行官会见特朗普后，美国批准英伟达向中国出口芯片
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋在白宫会见美国总统唐纳德-特朗普后，美国商务部已开始向英伟达公司发放向中国出口H20芯片的许可证。【原文：The U.S. commerce department has started issuing licenses to Nvidia to export its H20 chips to China after CEO Jensen Huang met President Donald Trump at the White House, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，电视广播公司 Nexstar 正在就收购竞争对手 Tegna 进行深入谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，电视广播公司 Nexstar Media Group 正在就收购竞争对手 Tegna 进行深入谈判。【原文：Television broadcaster Nexstar Media Group is in advanced talks to acquire rival Tegna , the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大与盟国一道降低俄罗斯石油价格上限
item.description: 加拿大财政部周五在一份声明中表示，加拿大政府将与一些最亲密的盟国一道，因俄罗斯在乌克兰的持续战争而降低俄罗斯石油的价格上限。【原文：The Canadian government said on Friday it will join some of its closest allies in lowering the price cap for Russian oil over its continued war in Ukraine, the country's finance department said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 工资飙升，阿根廷人在 2025 年上半年烤出更多牛肉
item.description: 罗萨里奥交易所周五发布的一份报告称，由于经济形势好转，阿根廷人可以花更多钱购买牛排，因此阿根廷人又开始大吃牛肉了。【原文：Argentines are once again chowing down on beef, as an economic turnaround has allowed them to fork over more for steaks, a report from the Rosario exchange said on Friday.】

item.title: 墨西哥要求阿迪达斯在美籍墨西哥设计师推出本土风格鞋款后赔偿损失
item.description: 墨西哥当局周五表示，一名与阿迪达斯合作的墨西哥裔美国设计师威利-查瓦里亚（Willy Chavarria）推出了一款灵感来自传统土著凉鞋的鞋，墨西哥正在寻求鞋业巨头阿迪达斯的赔偿。【原文：Mexico is looking for footwear giant Adidas to pony up after a Mexican-American designer working with the firm, Willy Chavarria, launched a shoe inspired by a traditional Indigenous sandal, authorities said on Friday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，特朗普团队扩大美联储主席人选范围，在名单上增加了新名字
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的团队正在审查下一任美联储主席的新竞争者，一位长期经济顾问和一位前任美联储主席被列入名单。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's team is reviewing new contenders to be the next chairman of the Federal Reserve, with a longtime economic consultant and a past Fed president added to the list, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国就业市场疲软，美联储官员倾向鸽派
item.description: 自美联储上月决定维持利率稳定以来，美国央行似乎正在发生转变，几位美联储官员对劳动力市场的担忧与日俱增，并表示他们对最快于 9 月降息持开放态度，甚至是不耐烦的态度。【原文：Since the Federal Reserve's decision last month to hold interest rates steady, a shift appears underway at the U.S. central bank, with several Fed officials sounding increasingly uneasy about the labor market and signaling their openness to, if not impatience for, a rate cut as soon as September.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，特朗普将解除比利-朗的国税局局长职务，贝森特被任命为代理局长
item.description: 纽约时报》周五援引四位熟知内情的人士的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将解除比利-朗（Billy Long）的国内税收署署长职务。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is removing Billy Long as the commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service, the New York Times reported on Friday, citing four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚分析师认为经济稳步增长，但财政风险隐现：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，哥伦比亚第二季度经济可能同比增长2.6%，这要归功于强劲的国内消费，尽管高于目标的通胀率使利率无法下降。【原文：Colombia's economy likely grew 2.6% in the second quarter from the year-ago period, a Reuters poll on Friday showed, thanks to strong domestic consumption even as above-target inflation keeps interest rates from coming down.】

item.title: 贸易机构数据显示，受关税担忧影响，美国6月进口降幅超预期
item.description: 美国全国零售联合会周五公布的数据显示，由于对关税政策变化的担忧打击了零售商，6月份美国进口下降幅度超过预期，这引发了购物者对商店产品选择减少的担忧。【原文：Imports into the United States fell more than expected in June as concerns around shifting tariff policies hit retailers, raising fears of fewer product options in stores for shoppers, data from the National Retail Federation showed on Friday.】

item.title: 贝恩资本支持的 Heartflow 在纳斯达克首次亮相，估值 22.7 亿美元，表现稳健
item.description: 周五，医疗技术公司 Heartflow 的估值达到 22.7 亿美元，其股价在纳斯达克首次亮相时大涨 47.4%，这是因为 IPO 市场正在积聚动力，超越关税担忧。【原文：Medtech firm Heartflow was valued at $2.27 billion on Friday, with its shares surging 47.4% in the Nasdaq debut, as the IPO market gathers momentum and outrides tariff worries.】

item.title: 汇丰银行因黄金走强和地缘政治风险上调银价展望
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）上调了 2025 年、2026 年和 2027 年的白银价格预测，理由是面对地缘政治和经济的不确定性，高企的黄金价格和避险需求提供了强有力的支撑。【原文：HSBC has lifted its silver price forecasts for 2025, 2026, and 2027, citing strong support from high gold prices and safe-haven demand in the face of geopolitical and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会终结对瑞波公司的诉讼，该公司将支付 1.25 亿美元罚款
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）表示，它已经结束了指控瑞波实验室（Ripple Labs）销售未注册证券的案件，1.25 亿美元的罚款未变，加密货币行业最受瞩目的诉讼之一也告一段落。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said it ended its case accusing Ripple Labs of selling unregistered securities, leaving a $125 million fine intact and ending one of the cryptocurrency industry's highest-profile lawsuits.】

item.title: 瑞士飞机制造商皮拉图斯因关税问题停止向美国交付公务机
item.description: 瑞士飞机制造商皮拉图斯（Pilatus）周五表示，已暂时停止向美国交付其PC-12和PC-24公务机，称美国新征收的高额关税使该公司处于 "严重的竞争劣势"。【原文：Swiss aircraft manufacturer Pilatus on Friday said it has temporarily halted deliveries of its PC-12 and PC-24 business jets to the United States, saying steep new U.S. tariffs put the company at "significant competitive disadvantage".】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普希望房利美和房地美今年上市
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府正在为抵押贷款融资巨头房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）今年晚些时候的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is preparing for the initial public offerings of mortgage finance giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac later this year, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】
